name: graphics-error-scraper
description: Scrapes a WebCTRL system to look for graphics errors.
author: Cameron Vogt

scripts.go: tsc -t es2022 -m commonjs index.ts && node index.js
scripts.exe: del /F *.exe *.blob *.js & tsc -t es2022 -m commonjs index.ts && node -e "require('fs').copyFileSync(process.execPath, 'graphics-error-scraper.exe')" && "C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\10\bin\10.0.26100.0\x64\signtool" remove /s graphics-error-scraper.exe && node --experimental-sea-config sea-config.json && npx postject graphics-error-scraper.exe NODE_SEA_BLOB sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2 && del /F *.blob
